welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vaciamadrid, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Al Punto
restaurants.description: Al Punto is a spanish restaurant located in Rivas-Vaciamadrid.
restaurants.address: Calle Juan De La Cierva, 58, 28521 Rivas-Vaciamadrid Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: Bebola
restaurants.description: Bebola is a tapas restaurant located in Rivas-Vaciamadrid.
restaurants.address: Avenida Ángel Saavedra, 1 (C. Jovellanos), 28521 Rivas-Vaciamadrid Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: Maroma
restaurants.description: Maroma is a tapas restaurant located in Rivas-Vaciamadrid.
restaurants.address: C. Aurelio Alvarez, 14T, 28521 Rivas-Vaciamadrid Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: Churreria Avenida
restaurants.description: Churreria Avenida is a breakfast spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: La Tagliatella
restaurants.description: La Tagliatella is a italian restaurant located in Rivas-Vaciamadrid.
restaurants.address: C.C H2Ocio, 28521 Rivas Vaciamadrid Comunidad de Madrid

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Torrejon AFB Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for international flights, with a focus on Iberia and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for international flights by SkyTeam airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a new login every 15 minutes.
